name: Extreme Cargo Transport Truck Driver & Forklift Crane Operator Game
name_original: Extreme Cargo Transport Truck Driver & Forklift Crane Operator Game
description:
Work as a cargo truck driver and operate forklift crane to load cargo boxes on trailer. Then drive the truck in off-road environment for transporting goods to destination.

Become a crane operator and start driving a forklift crane. Lift cargo boxes and carefully place them inside the trailer truck. Then drive away in cargo truck and deliver the goods on time to complete the mission. If needed, get fuel from gas station on your way to delivering the goods. Driving a large 18 wheeler on hillside curvy roads can be tricky so be careful or you will damage the goods. Deliver goods safely and before the deadline. Experience the thrill of becoming a cargo truck driver on hillside curvy roads.

Please give us your feedback in reviews section so we can improve your gaming experience.
